name: Voxelizer
title: Voxelizer for {game}
description: A tool to convert a 3d model to a voxelized 3d model

explanation.title: How to voxelize
explanation.text: You can convert a image to a {game} Map using this Map Maker for {game}! First, upload your images. Afterwards, customize your image, choose the settings and the converting process wil begin! Follow the instructions given (after converting) on how to get it in your {game} world.
